entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • gc-standalone: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfig/TestConfig.sh [FAIL] #66905
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128.LoadUnsafe<TFrom,TTo> #66901
  • System.Text.Json exception when serializing an inheriting type where a new property returns a new type with same name #66900
  • System.Text.Json NotSupportedException #66897
  • Is it possible to get a volatile reference of an ImmutableArray<T>? #66896
  • String Comparation Globalization Not Working in Blazor WebAssembly #66899

Closed

  • JIT: Incorrect optimization of x & -x on x86 #66709
    7.0.0
  • PipeReader.ReadAsync and PipeWriter.FlushAsync don't preserve the SynchronizationContext #66893
  • tests/runtest.sh not copying libraries from 'testNativeBinDir' into 'testRootDir' #7456
    Future
  • Allow overriding the __DistroRid in build.sh #7523
    Future
  • Consider removing cross compilation setup code from compileoptions.cmake #7524
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid bool[] allocation in MemberInfoCache.PopulateProperties #66912
  • Release `CordbUnmanagedThread` instance from `CordbProcess` member #66910
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Replace XmlSchema ContentValidator Hashtables that are boxing lots of ints #66908
    area-System.Xml
  • Clear gcServer before running the scenario #66907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix reporting GC refs as byrefs for crossgen2 promoted structs #66903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Better addressing modes around bytes #66902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a few #ifdef vs. #if issues #66898
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improved The Performance Of Logger #66895
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix typo in detecting sys/auxv.h #66894
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Delete IL verifier support in the VM #66616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add flags checks to BMI1 intrinsic lowering #66736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update coredistools from 1.0.1-prerelease-00006 to 1.1.0 #66861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Vectorize Guid equality. #66889
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1673062 #66883
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #66844
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Podcast app repo #66843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fixes 42643 Work in Progress attempt at getting this to work - https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/42643 #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove the llvmonly exception handling code, its not used any … #66875
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
